DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study find body react study drug call baricitinib take another drug call omeprazole . For participant , study include 2 period fix order . The study last approximately 25 day , include screening .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Baricitinib Omeprazole Healthy Participants
DOC.criteria: Overtly healthy determine medical history physical examination Women childbearing potential due surgical sterilization ( least 3 month surgical hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy without hysterectomy , bilateral tubal occlusion/ligation ) confirm medical history , menopause Have body mass index 18 29 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) , inclusive , screen Have know allergy baricitinib , omeprazole , related compound , component baricitinib omeprazole formulation , history significant atopy Have history current cardiovascular , respiratory , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , hematological ( include clot disorder ) , neurological disorder capable significantly alter absorption , metabolism , elimination drug ; constitute risk take study medication ; interfere interpretation data Have absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) less 2 × 109 per liter ( L ) ( 2000 cells/microliter [ μL ] ) screen Day 1 . For abnormal value , single repeat allow Intend use overthecounter prescription medication ( include drug substance know alter gastric potential hydrogen ( pH ) , proton pump inhibitor overthecounter antacid remedy and/or herbal supplement within 14 day prior dose study ( exception hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) occasional paracetamol , permit discretion investigator ) , intend use vitamin supplement Day 1 discharge clinical research unit ( CRU ) Have use intend use drug substance know substrate , inhibitor , inducer cytochrome P450 3A4 ( CYP3A4 ) within 30 day prior dose throughout study Are unable tolerate unwilling undergo insertion nasogastric pH probe assessment gastric pH study
